product_name: Gramicci Tara V-Neck T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Not your ordinary tee, the women's Gramicci Tara V-Neck T-Shirt is made from durable hemp that remarkably resists odor and certified organic cotton, both free of pesticides and herbicides. Gramicci Natural Performance Technology fabric is breathable, fast drying and odor resistant, so you stay fresh all day long. Offers UPF 20 sun protection. Gramicci Tara V-Neck T-Shirt features a slim, next-to-body fit and a flattering deep V-neck. Longer curved hem in back eliminates riding up while hiking or backpacking. Flatseam construction prevents chafing and discomfort. Wash separately in cold water before wearing. Closeout.
short_description: Not your ordinary tee, the women's Gramicci Tara V-Neck T-Shirt is made from durable hemp that remarkably resists odor and certified organic cotton, both free of pesticides and herbicides.
